resources.string: PIPS has encountered an IllegalStateException trying to open a database of your previous scans. This is a known bug, but I need more information to fix it. Send debugging information?

Long press on an item to open, share, and delete.
Unconditionally try to use the su command to gain root privileges.
Save old targets and scan results in pips.db accessible only by this program.
Shows debugging information in logcat for development and debugging.
This experimental feature may not work on early versions of Android.
To clear all history, uninstall and reinstall this program, then wipe free disk space.
